name: Dragon View
overview: Warrior! Open your eyes! This is the future of gaming! Look, before you leap, this isn't some corny collection of cardboard dungeons and dragons. It's a brilliant new vision of RPG action adventure, with real-time 16 meg 3D scrolling like you've never seen. Plus an incredible hero's-eye-view of the danger. Through caves of fire and meadows of ice, against brutal demons and unforeseen evils, all the way to a showdown you'll never forget, bring your bow, your sword, your magic. And don't blink - or you're doomed!
